body: Microprocessor architecture; memory system design; assembly language programming; interrupts; the stacks and subroutines; memory and I/O inter- facing; serial I/O and data communications; microprocessors applications.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPEN271 ; CMPEN275)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPEN 351: Microprocessors
